instructions: Instructing Google Assistant to Turn Itself Off remove google assistant Ok Google, Turn Yourself Off Disabling Google Assistant can be as easy as saying OK Google or Hey Google and telling it to turn itself off. If you have assigned another trigger word for Google Assistant to launch, say your magic words instead of the standard OK Google or Hey Google . Nevertheless, doing so might not fully disable the Google Assistant. Some reported that it still continues to pop-up, asking the user to enable it again after inserting their headphones. Turn Off Google Assistant on Google App Google App Icon Google App Icon You can also disable your Google Assistant right on the Google App. Open Google App Tap More Tap Settings Tap Google Assistant Scroll on the devices where you ve enabled your Google Assistant. Toggle Off. Turn Off Google Assistant Using the Home Button android home button Android Home Button Touch and hold the Home button Tap Explore Tap More (or the Menu Bar which is usually represented by 3 dots) Select Settings Select Phone Toggle Google Assistant Off Deactivate Google Assistant on your Phone s Settings Android Phone Settings Icon Phone Settings Icons Go to your phone s Settings Menu Tap on Phone Toggle disable Google Assistant Go to Voice and turn off Voice Recognition Alternatively, on some devices, you can try the following. Select Settings Select Systems & Devices Select Additional Settings It should have the Shortcuts option. Select it and go to Launch Google Assistant. Select None
